summary: Unit test module that verifies the Certbot Google Cloud DNS plugin's authenticator and DNS client implementations, covering initialization, credential handling, client caching, authentication flow, DNS TXT record creation, retrieval, deletion, zone resolution, polling, TTL handling, splitâ€‘horizon scenarios, and error conditions.
